Lock Screen
  • Data
    To enable the pin screen by default on startup, change the pinLock entry in conf/config.json to

    "pinLock" :
    {
    "enabled" : true,
    "timeout" : 2
    }

    and to disable it on startup change it to

    "pinLock" :
    {
    "enabled" : false,
    "timeout" : 2
    }
